formElement.documentation: Entry ID of the entry to be queried. Either entry ID or entry number should be defined.
formElement.label: Entry ID:

formElement.documentation: Field name for Number field, e.g. ReleaseID.
formElement.label: Entry Number Field:

formElement.documentation: Entry Number, e.g. RLM000000000013. Either entry number or entry id should be defined.
formElement.label: Entry Number:

formElement.documentation: Field name of the status field, will be used to fill "status" output parameter.
formElement.label: Status Field:
